snippet: Three Saudis suspected of having ties to the Islamic State extremist group have been arrested in the shooting of a Danish citizen here last month, the kingdom’s Interior Ministry said.
lead_paragraph: Three Saudis suspected of having ties to the Islamic State extremist group have been arrested in the shooting of a Danish citizen here last month, the kingdom’s Interior Ministry said.

headline.main: Saudis Arrest 3 in Shooting of Dane
headline.print_headline: Saudis Arrest 3 in Shooting of Dane

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
